sub_title: Domain Architect, CoE Enterprise Architecture at ING
summary:
Mandar is an experienced architect with a passion for technology and people. His 16 years of experience include envisioning/defining strategic architectures and driving/designing/developing solutions for mission critical applications, that span across multiple domains and technologies. He demonstrates high organizational sensitivity and can communicate effectively in four languages, including fluent English and conversational Dutch (B1+). He holds Dutch nationality and has Indian roots.

His method of leading and driving key initiatives is by influencing the critical stakeholders at the right time; by convincing them using solid rationale and by keeping a strong emphasis on collaboration. He does this by adjusting his communication style depending on the level/type of the audience; from Management Team(s) to Business and Engineering Squad(s).

On a daily basis, Mandar does following:
•	serves as a Trusted Advisor for Business/IT-Delivery Stakeholders and his peers
•	defines/refines/consults on -Target/Tactical/Transition- architectures/solutions/design decisions for his Tribe(s), to address structural problems in –and/or– across the underlying domain(s)
•	collaborates with –shares knowledge, guides and advices– Architecture/Business/Delivery stakeholders on strategic topics with complex impact in terms of both IT Systems and organization

He is not only empathetic but also loves coaching and motivating people. He enjoys bringing people together to collaborate towards a common goal (with flexible steering if/as necessary). He fundamentally believes in continuous learning and transparent way of working. Moreover, he has an innate drive for improvement of the ecosystem; by observing the environment, identifying patterns and proactively engaging with various stakeholders for structural change(s).

Mandar has experience in and an in-depth understanding of: SDLC in a distributed team environment in Agile/Scrum/Biz-Dev-Ops/ITIL and traditional methodologies. 

He is familiar with: Archimate, ARIS, TOGAF, REST APIs, Micro services, SOA, Business Process and Case Management, ITIL Service Management, Spring Boot, Microsoft Azure, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, IFX, Linux, Shell script, SQL, Java/JEE, Python, Pega and more.

school.name: Maharashtra State Board of Technical Education

certifications.name: Nederlands als tweede taal - niveau B1

profile_positions.description:
Currently responsible for Architecture of Tribe Business Lending and Domain Insurance, of ING Netherlands.

Have been responsible for Architecture of Digital Channels (Mobile and Internet Banking) of ING Netherlands, ING Belgium and specific ING Global topics; with primary focus as Lead Architect on Mobile Banking and Third Party Integrations in Channels (BE+NL).

Key contributions include:

* Integration Health Insurance: Lead and designed a modular architecture, for ING as Sales and Distribution Channel of externally provided Health Insurance in the Netherlands. This includes the concepts of Consent, Agreement and Product life cycle management via. event driven architecture and more.

* Third Party Integration Platform (ATARI): Envisioned a core platform to facilitate and speed up Third Party Integrations within Channels with a universal, flexible and modular approach to onboarding, re-entry and servicing customer journeys. This also includes stakeholder alignment with Management Team of Enterprise Architecture, in addition to Business and Delivery Leads and more.

* Hybrid Enhanced WebView in OneApp: Lead and drove the initiative from Channels Architecture, to structurally incorporate Enhanced WebView in OneApp; in order to empower Product Tribes and significantly reduce redundant source codes that would need to be managed otherwise. Also, contributed to setting up necessary governance and a quick start Cookbook for technical implementation and guidance.

* Subscription Management: Architected and designed Channel agnostic Global solution with a Target horizon and a Tactical solution for immediate needs in BE. This includes PSD2 Account Information Service (AIS) and bespoke API integration with Swedish partner company Minna. It also includes Consent management, Identity management, Data Lake and KAFKA based event management and integrations with other key ING capabilities.
profile_positions.title: Domain Architect

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for full stack solution architecture in various functional streams with primarily Pega platform applications in the Business Lending Domain. 

Key contributions include:

* Sub-cluster Risk and Special Asset Management Enterprise: Functionality related to automation of monitoring and interpretation of various financial events to generate risk/ default triggers, creating and managing a comprehensive customer dossier which contains actual/ potential risks, mitigations/ actions including forbearance measures, provisions etc. as per ECB/ EBA NPL and Rabobank internal guidelines.

* Facility Management: Applications responsible for determining and managing financial facilities, identifying at risk customers based on arrears/ days past due, payment defaults and IFRS 9 reporting.

* Smart Investigations (Payments): Functionality related to processing of payment inquiries in Rabobank. It is a case management system, which has both automated and manual (non-STP) employee facing processes. Besides inquiries, Smart Investigate is also used for supporting Risk and Certification processes.

* Pricing: The new Pricing engine within Rabobank to calculate tariffs and fees on financing products for corporate and retail customers.

* Sales and Services street: Architecture and design of business process and case management applications based on Pega platform, that are both customer (internet) and employee (intranet) facing, which provide capabilities for request, fulfillment (and maintenance) of financing needs of corporate customers.

In addition to this, lead/contributed to multiple cross cutting concerns such as:
* Software (Pega) Quality Measurements based on ISO 25010 and SIG criteria
* Data collection and analysis using Google Analytics
* PCF/Azure platform with Azure DevOps
* CICD with automated pipelines
* Upgrades and life cycle management
* Performance
* Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX) Compliance
* Security
* Modular, API based architecture and more
profile_positions.title: Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
Analysed business needs and requirements and did gap analysis of expected and existing system capabilities for optimal (re)use of existing system components and FIS products.

Created and helped to create solution architecture/design, which is flexible, extensible and defined the end-to-end solution comprising integration with multiple systems and the orchestration required.

Created functional designs and interface specifications, data model, cardinality diagrams and other functional/ technical documentation including UML designs depicting the integrated solution and IFX2.0 compliant XML schema definitions.

Designed SOA compliant Web Services which interacted with the channel applications and core processing systems.
profile_positions.title: Technology Business Consultant Senior

profile_positions.description:
Collaborated with business analysts and subject matter experts to understand the requirements and analysed them.

Created functional designs and interface specifications, data model, cardinality diagrams and other functional/ technical documentation including UML designs depicting the integrated solution.

Continued to follow Agile Scrum principles to perform the duties of a Scrum Master.
profile_positions.title: Solution Designer and Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
Ensured that projects are executed with quality, within time-budget and without compromising Scrum principles, through pragmatic solutions, while managing the client/ stakeholders.

Continued to design, develop and implement complex scalable applications.
profile_positions.title: Senior Developer and Scrum Master

profile_positions.description: Developed, tested, troubleshooted/ debugged and implemented complex scalable applications, components and SOA compliant services for the internet and mobile banking systems of ABN AMRO.
profile_positions.title: Developer

profile_positions.location: Amsterdam Area, Netherlands, Mumbai Area, India
